item.title: The Devastating Decline of a Brilliant Young Coder

item.title: Western Digital admits 2TB-6TB WD Red NAS drives use shingled magnetic recording – Blocks and Files
item.description: Some users are experiencing problems adding the latest WD Red NAS drives to RAID arrays and suspect it is because they are actually shingled magnetic recording drives submarined into the channel. Alan Brown, a network manager at UCL Mullard Space Science Laboratory, the UK’s largest university-based space research group, told us about his problems adding …

item.title: Personal gmail account claimed by SSO, can't login anymore.
item.description: My login to trello is with my personal gmail account. With the new SSO login screen, as soon as I enter my gmail address, it redirects me to my previous company sso page (which i left 5 years ago btw). The email address is clearly @gmail.com. It being claimed by an SSO without my consent is extremel...

item.title: Windows Subsystem for Linux 2 Moving into General Availability with Improved Update Process
item.description: Microsoft announced that Windows Subsystem for Linux 2 (WSL2) will be generally available in Windows 10, version 2004. WSL2 was released into the Insider Program last year. With the move to general availability, WSL2 can now be automatically updated via standard Windows Updates.
